content:
Semantic Colorization in C/C++ VSCode extension
https://devblogs.microsoft.com/cppblog/visual-studio-code-c-c-extension-july-2019-update/

We are also doing highlights on rust-analyzer vscode extension, so we can learn from it if we're missing something.

Interesting! Looks like they are using the same hack as we do. I guess we need to wait until this is added to VS Code and LSP proper, although I don't really like the current direction of highlighting...
